channel.title: Westscape - Added talking npcs
channel.description:
95% westscape 5% me for making npcs talk
Pics = http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,337493.0.html
All i did is made loads of npcs talk and edited a few lil things othing big tho..
This is just for people who dont know how to make npcs talk, so ive done it for them.
http://uppit.com/v/BJOCO2VZ
